headline: Here’s how investors can play latest wave of corporate breakups
summary: Corporate breakups have been a key theme of 2025 so far. Vinson & Elkins' strategic mergers & acquisitions (M&A) head Sebastian Tiller sits down with Josh Lipton to discuss the trend. Read up on Yahoo Finance's coverage of the rising occurrence of corporate breakups.  To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.

headline: Corteva shares fall as potential split report stirs worries over operational disruptions
summary: (Reuters) -Corteva shares fell about 4% on Monday after a report the U.S. agrichemicals company was looking to separate its seed and crop protection chemical businesses stoked concerns about potential operational disruption and value dilution. The combined business model has historically delivered strong synergies, including co-developed seed traits and crop protection products, as well as bundled solutions for farmers. Corteva's potential split of its seed and crop protection businesses lacks clear strategic or financial merit and could weaken both units, Bank of America analyst Matthew DeYoe said.
